// Tessellation Domain   # of control points
// -------------------- --------------------
// Triangle                                3
//
ds_5_0
dcl_input_control_point_count 3
dcl_tessellator_domain domain_tri
dcl_globalFlags refactoringAllowed
dcl_constantbuffer cb3[7], immediateIndexed
dcl_sampler s0, mode_default
dcl_sampler s1, mode_default
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t0
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t1
dcl_input vDomain.xyz
dcl_input vicp[3][0].xyzw
dcl_input vicp[3][2].xyzw
dcl_input vicp[3][3].xyzw
dcl_input vicp[3][4].xyzw
dcl_input vicp[3][5].xyzw
dcl_input vicp[3][6].w
dcl_input vicp[3][8].xw
dcl_output_siv o0.xyzw, position
dcl_output o1.xyzw
dcl_output o2.xyzw
dcl_output o3.xyzw
dcl_output o4.xyzw
dcl_output o5.xyzw
dcl_output o6.xyzw
dcl_output o7.xyzw
dcl_output o8.xyzw
dcl_output o9.xyzw
dcl_temps 8
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t125

mul r0.xyzw, vDomain.yyyy, vicp[1][3].xyzw
mad r0.xyzw, vDomain.xxxx, vicp[0][3].xyzw, r0.xyzw
mad r0.xyzw, vDomain.zzzz, vicp[2][3].xyzw, r0.xyzw
lt r1.x, l(0.200000), |r0.z|
and r1.x, r1.x, l(0x3f800000)
dp3 r1.y, -r0.xyzx, -r0.xyzx
sqrt r1.y, r1.y
mul r1.y, r1.y, l(0.500000)
min r1.y, r1.y, l(1.000000)
mul r1.y, r1.y, r1.y
add r2.xyz, -r0.xyzx, cb3[6].xyzx
mul r3.xyzw, r2.xyxy, vicp[0][8].wwww
mul r4.xyzw, r3.xyzw, l(0.012500, 0.012500, 0.025000, 0.025000)
mad r3.xyzw, r3.xyzw, l(0.012500, 0.012500, 0.025000, 0.025000), l(0.015625, 0.000000, 0.015625, 0.000000)
sample_l_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r5.xyz, r4.xyxx, t0.xyzw, s1, l(0.000000)
sample_l_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r6.xyz, r4.zwzz, t0.xyzw, s1, l(0.000000)
mad r5.xyz, r6.xyzx, l(1.500000, 1.500000, 1.000000, 0.000000), r5.xyzx
mul r5.xyz, r1.yyyy, r5.xyzx
mul r6.xyz, r5.xyzx, vicp[0][8].xxxx
mad r2.xyz, r6.xyzx, l(0.060000, 0.060000, 0.060000, 0.000000), r2.xyzx
mov r2.w, l(1.000000)
dp4 r1.z, cb3[2].xyzw, r2.xyzw
mul r1.x, r1.x, r1.z
dp4 r1.w, r0.xyzw, r0.xyzw
mov o4.xyzw, r0.xyzw
sqrt r0.x, r1.w
lt r0.x, r0.x, l(2.000000)
movc o0.z, r0.x, r1.x, r1.z
dp4 r0.x, cb3[0].xyzw, r2.xyzw
dp4 r0.y, cb3[1].xyzw, r2.xyzw
dp4 r0.w, cb3[3].xyzw, r2.xyzw
mov o7.xyz, r2.xyzx
mov o0.xyw, r0.xyxw

// Halo fix
ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r7.xyzw, l(0, 0, 0, 0), t125.xyzw
add r7.w, r0.w, -r7.y
mad r0.x, r7.w, r7.x, r0.x

mad r0.xy, r0.xyxx, l(1.000000, -1.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000), r0.wwww
mul o2.xy, r0.xyxx, l(0.500000, 0.500000, 0.000000, 0.000000)
mul r2.xyzw, vDomain.yyyy, vicp[1][0].xyzw
mad r2.xyzw, vDomain.xxxx, vicp[0][0].xyzw, r2.xyzw
mad o1.xyzw, vDomain.zzzz, vicp[2][0].xyzw, r2.xyzw
mov_sat r0.x, r0.w
mov o2.w, r0.w
sqrt r0.x, r0.x
mad o2.z, -r0.x, l(0.150000), l(1.000000)

// reflection:
mul r0.xyzw, vDomain.yyyy, vicp[1][2].xyzw
mad r0.xyzw, vDomain.xxxx, vicp[0][2].xyzw, r0.xyzw
mad r0.xyzw, vDomain.zzzz, vicp[2][2].xyzw, r0.xyzw

// Fix reflections:
add r7.w, r0.w, -r7.y
mul r7.w, r7.w, r7.x
mad r0.x, r7.w, l(0.5), r0.x

mov o3.xyzw, r0.xyzw

mul r0.xyzw, vDomain.yyyy, vicp[1][4].xyzw
mad r0.xyzw, vDomain.xxxx, vicp[0][4].xyzw, r0.xyzw
mad o5.xyzw, vDomain.zzzz, vicp[2][4].xyzw, r0.xyzw
mul r0.xyzw, vDomain.yyyy, vicp[1][5].xyzw
mad r0.xyzw, vDomain.xxxx, vicp[0][5].xyzw, r0.xyzw
mad o6.xyzw, vDomain.zzzz, vicp[2][5].xyzw, r0.xyzw
sample_l_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r0.xy, r3.xyxx, t0.xyzw, s1, l(0.000000)
sample_l_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r0.zw, r3.zwzz, t0.zwxy, s1, l(0.000000)
mad r0.xy, r0.zwzz, l(1.500000, 1.500000, 0.000000, 0.000000), r0.xyxx
mad r0.xy, r0.xyxx, r1.yyyy, -r5.xyxx
add r0.x, r0.y, r0.x
mul r0.y, vDomain.y, vicp[1][6].w
mad r0.y, vDomain.x, vicp[0][6].w, r0.y
mad r0.y, vDomain.z, vicp[2][6].w, r0.y
mul_sat r0.xz, r0.xxyx, l(-0.035000, 0.000000, 1.500000, 0.000000)
add_sat r0.y, r0.y, r0.y
mad o7.w, r0.z, -r0.x, r0.x
sample_l_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r0.xzw, r4.xyxx, t1.xwyz, s0, l(0.000000)
sample_l_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r1.xyz, r4.zwzz, t1.xyzw, s0, l(0.000000)
mad r0.xzw, r0.xxzw, l(2.000000, 0.000000, 2.000000, 2.000000), l(-1.000000, 0.000000, -1.000000, -1.000000)
mad r0.xzw, r1.xxyz, l(2.000000, 0.000000, 2.000000, 2.000000), r0.xxzw
add r0.xzw, r0.xxzw, l(-1.000000, 0.000000, -1.000000, -1.000000)
add r1.xyz, -r0.xzwx, l(0.000000, 0.000000, 1.000000, 0.000000)
mad o8.xyz, r0.yyyy, r1.xyzx, r0.xzwx
mov o8.w, l(0)
mov o9.xyzw, l(0,0,0,0)
ret 
// Approximately 72 instruction slots used
